summary: A young woman on the frontier marries a meek farmer who has an annoying habit of going through a rather drastic change every full moon.
cast: Lori Ashton|Hart Bochner|Pat Atkins|Eleanor Baggett|Daphne Zuniga|Richard Barlow|Stephen Blake|Sharon Chatten|Stephen Cole|Raymond De Felitta|Janice Dejon|Barbara Dow|Fionnula Flanagan|Cameron Frankley|Reed Hollister|Alix Koromzay|Michael Latshaw|Heide Amurri|Travis Jordan Marsh|Mary Stuart Masterson|Kathy Messick|Janet Momjian|Melissa Moore|Tom Mustin|Bob Shurtleff|Michael Sládek|Ryan Slater|Jacqueline Stansbury|Hank Stone|Morgan Stuart|Jonathan Tripp|Cec Verrell|Colin Firth
title: La maldición de la luna
